description: What’s safe? What should you avoid? Here’s a guide to help you as we return to normal activities.
title: Gyms? Elevators? Here’s a Quick Coronavirus Risk Assessment
title_page: Gyms? Elevators? Here’s a Quick Coronavirus Risk Assessment - The New York Times
maintext:
A Quick Coronavirus Risk Assessment
As things begin to reopen, how can you more safely return to normal activities? What should you avoid? Here’s a guide:
Dmitry Kostyukov for The New York Times
(Important: You should still continue to wash your hands, avoid touching your face and wear a mask to reduce your risk of catching coronavirus).
